sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Cancels an invoice document in SAP S/4HANA RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Select BAPI - Option to select either standard or custom BAPI.
  • Invoice Document Number - Invoice document number that needs to be cancelled. Sample Input : 5105609974.
  • Fiscal Year - Year in which invoice document was created. Sample Input : 2023.
  • Reversal Reason - Reason for reversing invoice document. Sample Input : RE.
  • Reversal Document Posting Date - Invoice document reversal date. Sample Input : 20230130.
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Cancel Invoice - Cancel invoice document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP S/4HANA - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Cancels an invoice document in SAP S/4HANA RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Select BAPI - Option to select either standard or custom BAPI.
  • Invoice Document Number - Invoice document number that needs to be cancelled. Sample Input : 5105609974.
  • Fiscal Year - Year in which invoice document was created. Sample Input : 2023.
  • Reversal Reason - Reason for reversing invoice document. Sample Input : RE.
  • Reversal Document Posting Date - Invoice document reversal date. Sample Input : 20230130.
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Cancel Invoice - Cancel invoice document details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error as returned from SAP S/4HANA - RFC in the RETURN object. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.
